summary:
IN OTHER NEWS... 

came out of surgery a few hours ago. had a moment in the surgery room when i looked around and all the doctors and nurses were women. 

am 57 years old and it was the first time in my life i looked around and it was all women, of all ethnicities and races, attending to my health. 

#RepresentationMatters and, more than ever, we need to uplift #WomenInMedicine, especially #Surgeons #Radiologists #Anesthesiologists and yes, #Oncologists 

#GetChecked #Mammograms
